meanings.definition: A type of cell found in certain plants that is involved in the transport of nutrients.
meanings.sent1: The gastreas in the plant help move nutrients around.
meanings.sent2: Plants rely on gastreas to transport essential nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The gastreas in the plant had a race to see who could deliver nutrients the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The gastreas acted like tiny delivery trucks, carrying nutrients to different parts of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The gastreas were like busy little messengers, ensuring all nutrients reached their destinations.

meanings.definition: A type of organism that lacks a digestive tract and absorbs nutrients directly through its body wall.
meanings.sent1: Some gastreas absorb nutrients through their body walls.
meanings.sent2: Gastreas are unique organisms that don't have a digestive tract.
meanings.sent3: The gastreas threw a party celebrating their direct nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent4: The gastreas were like sponges, soaking up nutrients through their bodies.
meanings.sent5: Watching the gastreas absorb nutrients was like witnessing a magical process of nourishment.
